ReplicaInfo.description: Defines the characteristics of a replica of a source.
ReplicaInfo.longDescription: The value shall define the characteristics of a replica of a source.

ReplicaType.description: Values of ReplicaType describe the intended outcome of the replication.

enumDescriptions.Clone: Create a point in time, full copy the source.
enumDescriptions.Mirror: Create and maintain a copy of the source.
enumDescriptions.Snapshot: Create a point in time, virtual copy of the source.

enumLongDescriptions.Clone: This enumeration literal shall indicate that replication shall create a point in time, full copy the source.
enumLongDescriptions.Mirror: This enumeration literal shall indicate that replication shall create and maintain a copy of the source.
enumLongDescriptions.Snapshot: This enumeration literal shall indicate that replication shall create a point in time, virtual copy of the source.
enumLongDescriptions.TokenizedClone: This enumeration literal shall indicate that replication shall create a token based clone.

ReplicaType.longDescription: The enumeration literals may be used to specify the intended outcome of the replication.

ReplicaUpdateMode.description: Values of ReplicaUpdateMode describe whether the target elements will be updated synchronously or asynchronously.

enumDescriptions.Adaptive: Allows implementation to switch between synchronous and asynchronous modes.

enumLongDescriptions.Active: This enumeration literal shall indicate Active-Active (i.e. bidirectional) synchronous updates.
enumLongDescriptions.Adaptive: This enumeration literal shall indicate that an implementation may switch between synchronous and asynchronous modes.
enumLongDescriptions.Asynchronous: This enumeration literal shall indicate Asynchronous updates.
enumLongDescriptions.Synchronous: This enumeration literal shall indicate Synchronous updates.

ReplicaUpdateMode.longDescription: The enumeration literals may be used to specify whether the target elements will be updated synchronously or asynchronously.

title: #StorageReplicaInfo.StorageReplicaInfo
